Message: The user completes the submission of the form
hi there, please review my campaigns

Hi Andi! I'd be happy to help you review your campaigns. Could you please provide more details about the specific campaigns you'd like me to review? For example, are there any particular metrics or performance issues you're concerned about?
no..i mean they have been stuck on Pending
i would like to get them approved

Got it, Andi. If your campaigns are stuck on Pending, it might be due to your account not being verified yet. To proceed with the verification process and have your account approved, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
